The retailer typically is an outperformer in the retail CDS sector  and while market expectations for the second quarter were already low bar  Macy's missed on earnings per share  sales and guided lower for the second half of the year.

column4: Analysis: Statoil to gain in Europe's shift to spot gas pricing
column5: LONDON/OSLO Norway's Statoil has been quick to offer pipeline gas contracts linked to spot prices rather than oil  and it stands to gain the most from these deals  while its clients are likely to find themselves at a disadvantage a few years later.

column4: Canada's Metro to operate Target's pharmacies in Quebec
column5: Canadian supermarket operator Metro Inc  will partner with Target Corp  to operate the U.S. retailer's in-store pharmacies in Quebec  a month after Loblaw Cos Ltd   Canada's largest grocer  said it would buy Shopper's Drug Mart .

column4: Canada's Metro to operate Target's pharmacies in Quebec

column4: India's Tata Motors global wholesales down 14 pct in July
